short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens the Rally item just by entering the id.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for an item in Rally workspace. You can easily open a Rally item(feature, story, etc) just by entering the id or search for any keyword. It takes the input and opens the rally url (e.g."https://rally1.rallydev.com/#/search?keywords=12345") in a new tab.
